topics.body:
So I had an argument with my granddad this morning.
We argued about profit margins in films. See my grandfather ADORES American Sniper and, no offense to anyone, I'm 100% indifferent to it, I told him that given the success of it's predecessor and buildup to it, Avengers 2 WILL have a larger profit margin than American Sniper. My grandfather, the stubborn jackass he is, can't deal with that.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c67f63636872693a430000#post_54c67f63636872693a430000
If I have to deal with grown ups 2 making more money than pacific rim and dredd, he can deal with avengers beating American sniper
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

Although I'm dragging him to Avengers 2 whether he likes it or not.
